attributes.action: save our 4 by 4s and air travel
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is generally for all who are unconvinced by the dangers of global warming, don't wish to be green taxed on air travel, can't be bothered to do anything or just like to use 4 by 4s and jet planes.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
